why_choose: Why choose this course? A diverse team of talented faculty nurturing technology. State of the art infrastructure and laboratories. Regularly updated curriculum to meet industry standards. Employment opportunities across the world. Enable students to work with the best software options. Various activities for securing top tech positions.
what_learn: What you will learn? Students will learn how to write code in various programming languages, understand data structures, and design algorithms. This is the core skill of a computer scientist. Understanding the hardware and how software interacts with it. This includes knowledge of CPUs, memory systems, and other computer components. Studying the theory and practical aspects of operating systems, including process management, memory management, file systems, and more. Learning the basics of computer networks, including protocols, network design, and network security. Gaining skills in web technologies, such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and server-side scripting. This includes building dynamic web applications. Engaging in hands-on projects and real-world applications to apply the knowledge and skills learned throughout the program.
